description: Update your Amazon SES account details.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1578.005 - Modify Cloud Compute Infrastructure: Modify Cloud Account Settings

incidents.description: From Compromised Keys to Phishing Campaigns: Inside a Cloud Email Service Takeover

securityImplications: Attackers might use PutAccountDetails to push the SES account into production mode.

simulation.value: aws sesv2 put-account-details --mail-type TRANSACTIONAL --website-url https://traildiscover.cloud --contact-language EN --use-case-description "We need to use the Amazon SES for sending the report pdf, payment receipt through email and user verify through email"
